fields_of_interest: Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Single market, Public Health, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Circular economy, resource efficiency, energy efficiency, construction and demolition waste, chemicals, dangerous substances, ETS, CPR
organisation_name: Finnish Association of Construction Product Industries (RTT)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
Finnish Association of Construction Product Industries (RTT) is  part of the Confederation of Finnish Construction Industries RT (CFCI) being the joint interest organisation of building contractors, special contractors and the construction product industry. 
www.rakennusteollisuus.fi
goals__remit: Finnish Association of Construction Product Industries (RTT) is  part of the Confederation of Finnish Construction Industries RT (CFCI) being the joint interest organisation of building contractors, special contractors and the construction product industry. RTT representing around 120 members of construction product manufacturers focuses its activities on business and industrial affairs. In addition RTT is a standard writing body of Finnish Standards Association (SFS) responsible of ISO and CEN standardisation in the field of building construction.
